description: KAY MENDOZA (PLAZA HOTEL) HAS NOT REPORTED TOT IN 5 YEARS. CLAIMS THE HOTEL IS RENTED AS APARTMENTS, ALTHOUGH IT IS NOT PERMITTED OR LICENSED AS SUCH. LORI WENT OUT AND GAVE A NOV ON 8/30/2016 TO REPORT THE MISSING TAX. OWNER HAS YET TO CONTACT THE CITY. NEED TO ISSUE A CITATION FOR THE TAX AND REPORTING DUE.
